values.description: KMS key for photo-editor-dev photo editor
values.policy: {"Id":"key-policy-photo-editor-dev","Statement":[{"Action":"kms:*","Effect":"Allow","Principal":{"AWS":"arn:aws:iam::000000000000:root"},"Resource":"*","Sid":"Enable IAM User Permissions"},{"Action":["kms:Encrypt","kms:Decrypt","kms:ReEncrypt*","kms:GenerateDataKey*","kms:DescribeKey"],"Effect":"Allow","Principal":{"Service":["s3.amazonaws.com","dynamodb.amazonaws.com","sqs.amazonaws.com","sns.amazonaws.com","lambda.amazonaws.com"]},"Resource":"*","Sid":"Allow use of the key for encryption/decryption"}],"Version":"2012-10-17"}

values.alarm_description: Overall application health based on multiple metrics
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-presign duration is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-status duration is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-worker duration is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-download duration is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-presign error rate is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-status error rate is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-worker error rate is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-download error rate is high
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-presign is being throttled
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-status is being throttled
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-worker is being throttled
Lambda function photo-editor-dev-download is being throttled

values.name: photo-editor-dev-error-analysis
values.query_string:
fields @timestamp, @message, @requestId
| filter @message like /ERROR/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100

values.alarm_description: SNS delivery success rate is low
High number of failed SNS notifications
High number of messages in queue
